**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 255 1.1 **Range** touch **Target** 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature --- Your hands become infused with powerful vitality, capable of healing a living creature or damaging an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creature with a touch.
  • **Willing Living Creature** The target regains 6 Hit Points. If the target is someone other than yourself, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round.
  • **Undead Creature** The target takes 1d6 vitality damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save; on a failure, the target also takes a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.
--- **Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 6, and the damage to an undead target increases by 1d6.
name: Lay on Hands
